topics.body:
God I forgot how much of an insane person Red was in the Adventures manga.
In volume 2 he goes to the Safari Zone. And you all know Safari Zone rules. All the Pokemon in your possession will be confiscated during your stay. So Red decides to piss off not one but TWO super strong pokemon so badly that they start beaing the shit out of EACH OTHER so they can get to him And after he catches one he uses it to catch the other. You're fucking crazy Red.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
